textBeforeTable: Facebook Tweet RSS Quote Reply Owen Thanks and regards, However, that thread (and the dll itself) is now over a decade and several OS versions old. Does it still do what it's supposed to do on a modern (read:64-bit) system? http://news.lugnet.com/cad/?n=9289 which at least tells me what it's supposed to do. All I could find of any use (there are a lot of posts to anti-virus forums containing this file as output of some virus scanner or other) was this LUGNET thread I was poking around in my LDraw installation this evening, and came across LDrawInfoTip.dll in %LDRAWDIR%/Apps/LDrawToolTip/. It doesn't correspond to any tool that I can recall, so I tried to find out what it was. Hi all.
